name: The World's Greatest Crab Recipe
author: Dreamthief
summary: When it comes to crab you have 3 options: you can go to the expensive seafood place for overpriced, soggy, and bland crab; you can ruin it yourself at home;  or you can follow this recipe and have crab so good you will never eat it any other way.
ingredients: 4 pounds Snow Crab clusters, thawed if necessary
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat
Whisk together the olive oil, butter, and garlic; generously brush onto crab
Cook crab on preheated grill, turning once, until the shell begins to brown, about 6 minutes
